content.query:
USE Sales;

SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;

-- query datasource
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS orders
WHERE 
    SalesOrderLineNumber = 3
    AND YEAR(OrderDate) = 2021
;

-- CETAS
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Accessories
    WITH (
        -- details for storing results
        LOCATION = 'special_orders/',
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_files,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
    )
AS
SELECT SalesOrderNumber, CustomerName, Quantity
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        -- details for reading source files
        BULK '*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS source_data
WHERE SalesOrderLineNumber = 3;
